programme.title: 72 Horas Para Morir
programme.desc: A triggerman nicknamed El Texano, raised by his father to be a hitman since he was abandoned by his mother, hears from a fortune teller that he has just 72 hours to live.

programme.title: 6 Impactos
programme.desc: El Pulpo is a small-time trafficker who, faced with the adversity of seeing his little son sick with a brain tumor, finds himself in need of robbing his boss to get the money he needs for the operation.

programme.title: Zapatillas Ferragamo
programme.desc: The Cartel has a power struggle that put their boss out of circulation to take away his power. But no one counts on his beautiful daughter to not letting anyone take away what is rightfully hers.

programme.title: Vidas Truncadas
programme.desc: A family is torn between an alcoholic husband, an abused wife, an older daughter who falls in love with a local criminal and a little sister that is raped by this young thug.

programme.title: Territorio Marcado
programme.desc: Felipe and his brother Alfonso have made a powerful enemy: Romulo, the most ruthless mafia boss in the region. One of them messed with his business and the other got in love with his daughter.

programme.title: Terror En La Sangre
programme.desc: A selection of classic scary stories from Guadalajara, including a group of women that goes to a non-existent party and meet a very unique guest. a man walking thru a parking lot without knowing the horror is about to face and two girls that conjure their recently deceased friend.

programme.title: Dogs' Breakfast
programme.desc: Blackmailed by dirty cops, rookie thieves Nathan and Jeff are send to steal a briefcase from a warehouse. But what seems to be an easy mission to avoid jail, unleashes their worst nightmares from the underworld of crime.

programme.title: El Camino Correcto
programme.desc: Arturo, a kid from the town of El Verde Bonao in rural Dominican Republic, takes advantage of the opportunities presented to him by going to town hoping to help his mother who has just been diagnosed with leukemia. Everything changes when he least expected.

programme.title: Yo Soy Otro
programme.desc: Jose discovers that not only has a classified mysterious disease where his body is covered by voracious bacterias, but also there are several 'replicas' of him with the same disease and looking for each other to kill the duplicates.

programme.title: Delivery Boy
programme.desc: An inept delivery boy takes a package with sensitive information and is confused with El Tibur贸n, a dangerous spy. Now, Agent Azul must try to stop this delivery thru a city in the middle of a pandemic, while El Tibur贸n tries to recover the package and unleash a terrorist attack in Florida with the codes it contains and this Delivery Boy just tries to do its unassuming job.

programme.title: El Hijo Del Presidente
programme.desc: A young and oblivious rich guy is kidnapped with one of his bodyguards after being seen in a disco giving away money. His captors soon discover they unexpectedly have captured the President's son, so they decide to teach him a lesson about the way of life in their hood.

programme.title: Sentenciados A Muerte: Guerrilleros Del Sur
programme.desc: You never know how much hate and resentment can be kept in the heart of a child until it is too late and fate makes him take justice on his own hands.

programme.title: Halc贸n Negro
programme.desc: Upon Dario's return to his hometown, from which he had been absent for a long time, his lifelong friend Cenobio informed him of the extortions, kidnappings, and violence suffered by the town by the Calaveras, a group of thugs and ruthless killers who have taken over the region.

programme.title: Los Pistoleros
programme.desc: In search of money, women and fame, a group of friends enter the world of the mafia as hired guns.
